ie.gmit.sw.language_detector

Class LangDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.language_detector.LangDetector

  • public class LangDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to detect an unknown language based on a LangDistStore. Encapsulates a map of LangDetectorStrategys, which define ways that languages can be detected. The algorithm can be switched on the fly with a call to switchToStrategy().

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LangDetector(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,LangDetectorStrategy> strategies, java.lang.String defaultStrategy)
      Creates a LangDetector with a map of strategies which it can use.

      • LangDetector

        public LangDetector(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,LangDetectorStrategy> strategies,
                    java.lang.String defaultStrategy)
        Creates a LangDetector with a map of strategies which it can use.
        Parameters:
        strategies - Map of strategies which this language detector can use.
        defaultStrategy - Default strategy to use for this language detector.

    • Method Detail

      • findClosestLanguage

        public Lang findClosestLanguage(LangDist unidentifiedLang,
                                LangDistStore store)
        Finds the closest language based on a k-mer distribution and a LangDistStore.
        Parameters:
        unidentifiedLang - K-mer distribution of unidentified language.
        store - Store of language distributions to compare to.

      • switchToStrategy

        public void switchToStrategy(java.lang.String newStrategy)
        Switches this language detector's strategy to a different algorithm.
        Parameters:
        newStrategy - Name of the new strategy to use.
